From Wiki

Linux: Flv2Avi

flv2avi.sh

#!/bin/bash

if [ -z $1 ]; then
 echo "Kullanimi: $0 input.flv"
 exit 1
fi

if [ ! -f $1 ]; then
 echo "Kullanimi: $0 input.flv"
 exit 1
fi

OUTPUT_FILE="`basename $1 .flv`.avi"
ffmpeg -i $1 -ar 48000 -ac 2 $OUTPUT_FILE
